title: FS:  George Manion SGC 60 (Really Tough SL)
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS:  George Manion SGC 60 (Really Tough SL)
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

For sale is a beautiful and rare George Manion Piedmont 350.  This southern leaguer is tough to find in such a high grade.  This card can be a great keystone toward building a southern leaguer subset.  

Last sold:  Goodwin & Co.  7/20/2012
See here:  [URL="http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=20803"]http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=20803[/URL]

Price:  $330 (-$20 lower) with shipping and insurance included!  PayPal only please.  

[IMG]http://www.goodwinandco.com/ItemImages/000020/Lot633a_med.jpeg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.goodwinandco.com/ItemImages/000020/Lot633b_med.jpeg[/IMG]
Bump for price drop.  Now $10 lower.

Bump.  Recent listings on eBay suggest this card is priced right.

Open to reasonable offers.
Bump for the last time!  I will consign if not sold!

Pm sent
